response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to your endeavors, estimated at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its unique attributes and unparalleled benefits, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Should you decide to proceed, we can arrange for immediate delivery and ensure a smooth transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
